name: aria-model-switcher
description: Switch between LLM models and toggle thinking/reasoning mode. Use no_think for faster simple queries.
author: Aria Team

tools.name: list_models
tools.description: List all available LLM models and show current active model.

tools.name: switch_model
tools.description: Switch to a different LLM model. All models defined in aria_models/models.yaml. Use list_models to see current catalog.

model.description: Model ID from aria_models/models.yaml catalog (use list_models to see available)

tools.name: get_current_model
tools.description: Get the currently active model name and thinking mode status.

tools.name: set_thinking_mode
tools.description: Toggle thinking/reasoning mode. Use enabled=true for complex tasks (code, math, analysis). Use enabled=false (/no_think) for simple queries (faster, cheaper).

enabled.description: true = show reasoning (<think>), false = skip reasoning (/no_think)

tools.name: get_thinking_mode
tools.description: Get current thinking mode status and which models support it.

tools.name: get_switch_history
tools.description: Get recent model and thinking mode switch history.

limit.description: Number of history entries to return (default: 10)
